conbody.p: Eucalyptus offers SAN support for EBS. The SANManager module directs the Storage Controller (SC) to manage supported SAN devices. Enabling the SANManager requires configuring the CLOUD_OPTS variable in eucalyptus.conf so that Eucalyptus loads the SANManager module and selects your SAN device at start time.

ol.li: Enable the specific SAN device (Dell, Netapp, or JBOD)
